name: A Cupcake Baker & Decorator Fun Cooking Game! FREE
name_original: A Cupcake Baker & Decorator Fun Cooking Game! FREE
description:
Swirled and sprinkled, dipped and glazed, or fancifully decorated, cupcakes are the treats that make everyone smile.

You can now mix, bake, decorate, eat and share the best, most delicious Cupcakes ever on your iPhone or iPod!

Enjoy a huge flavor selection with cakes, frostings, toppings, and embellishments that can be combined to produce just the right cupcake for everyone. Alongside traditional favorites like yellow cupcakes swirled with fluffy vanilla frosting and devil's food cupcakes crowned with rich, dark chocolate buttercream, there are also sweet surprises such as peanut butter and jelly cupcakes.

There's a wide variety of icing flavors and large selection of sprinkles and candy toppings to add the finishing touches to your special treat.

High quality graphics and sound with authentic step by step realistic baking from scratch.

- 20 Festive and Whimsical Cupcake Liners
- 25 Frostings
- 17 cake recipes
- 48 Sprinkles and Candy Toppings
- 20 Icing Flavors and Styles

Eat your cupcake bite by bite. It looks so real!

Share with family and friends. Save to your photo library.
